column5: a fatal accident occurred on  National Road No. 5 in front of Ta Pou Primary School
column9: Kampong Chhnang Province.------A BPA Transport bus hit a black motorcycle
column10: seriously injuring two people. The driver fled the scene on foot.------One of the victims was Phim Srey Neang
column11: a 30-year-old female resident of Dok Kao Mao village
column14: Kampong Chhnang province.------The evidence has been turned over to the police station
